foreignData.name: Gwafa Hazid, der Schieber
foreignData.text:
{W}{U}, {T}: Lege eine Bestechungsmarke auf eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du nicht kontrollierst. Ihr Beherrscher zieht eine Karte.
Kreaturen mit Bestechungsmarken können nicht angreifen oder blocken.

foreignData.name: Gwafa Hazid, ventajista
foreignData.text:
{W}{U}, {T}: Pon un contador de soborno sobre la criatura objetivo que no controlas. Su controlador roba una carta.
Las criaturas con contadores de soborno sobre ellas no pueden atacar o bloquear.

foreignData.flavorText: « Tout le monde a son prix. »
foreignData.name: Gwafa Hazid, mercanti
foreignData.text:
{W}{U}, {T} : Mettez un marqueur « pot-de-vin » sur une créature ciblée que vous ne contrôlez pas. Son contrôleur pioche une carte.
Les créatures avec des marqueurs « pot-de-vin » sur elles ne peuvent ni attaquer, ni bloquer.

foreignData.name: Gwafa Hazid, Profittatore
foreignData.text:
{W}{U}, {T}: Metti un segnalino corruzione su una creatura bersaglio che non controlli. Il suo controllore pesca una carta.
Le creature con segnalini corruzione non possono attaccare o bloccare.

foreignData.name: 成金、グヮファ・ハジード
foreignData.text:
{W}{U}, {T}：あなたがコントロールしていないクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それの上に賄賂カウンターを１個置く。 それのコントローラーはカードを１枚引く。
賄賂カウンターが置かれているクリーチャーは攻撃もブロックもできない。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 人間・ならず者

foreignData.name: Gwafa Hazid, Especulador
foreignData.text:
{W}{U}, {T}: Coloque um marcador de suborno na criatura alvo que você não controla. Seu controlador compra um card.
As criaturas com marcadores de suborno não podem atacar nem bloquear.

foreignData.name: Гвафа Хазид, Барышник
foreignData.text:
{W}{U}, {T}: положите жетон подкупа на целевое существо не под вашим контролем. Контролирующий его игрок берет карту.
Существа с жетонами подкупа не могут атаковать или блокировать.

foreignData.name: 投机客瓜法哈基
foreignData.text:
{W}{U}，{T}：在目标不由你操控的生物上放置一个贿赂指示物。 其操控者抓一张牌。
其上有贿赂指示物的生物不能进行攻击或阻挡。

name: Gwafa Hazid, Profiteer
originalText:
{W}{U}, {T}: Put a bribery counter on target creature you don't control. Its controller draws a card.
Creatures with bribery counters on them can't attack or block.

rulings.text: If Gwafa Hazid leaves the battlefield, any bribery counters will remain where they are. However, without a Gwafa Hazid on the battlefield, creatures with bribery counters on them can attack and block as normal. If another Gwafa Hazid enters the battlefield, its ability will affect all creatures with bribery counters on them, including the ones that received counters from a different Gwafa Hazid.

Creatures with bribery counters on them can’t be declared as attackers or blockers. However, if a bribery counter is put on a creature that’s already been declared as an attacker or blocker, that creature will continue to attack or block that combat.

text:
{W}{U}, {T}: Put a bribery counter on target creature you don't control. Its controller draws a card.
Creatures with bribery counters on them can't attack or block.
